Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.8163497] MHC>100 ÂµM against human red blood cell.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptide (By similarity). Stimulates insulin secretion by BRIN-BD11 cells in vitro.

Literature.Title: Skin secretions of Rana saharica frogs reveal antimicrobial peptides esculentins-1 and -1B and brevinins-1E and -2EC with novel insulin releasing activity.
Literature.Author: Marenah L, Flatt PR, Orr DF, Shaw C, Abdel-Wahab YH.
